TopicTitle: Any way to fully remove the Mie dust effects from Scatterer?

Articles.Content:
I have been messing around with the configs for a little in Scatterer, just experimenting, but I couldn't find a way to remove the Mie dust particles. I was trying to remove the dust particles visible in the image of Duna, but couldn't find a solution. Is there any way to do this?

(here's what I'd like Duna to look like)

I think the second image comes from Astronomer’s Visual Pack (AVP) so try installing that? It might not be possible to replicate that look though as the various mods required have been updated since then, as has the game itself.
Thanks! I'll check it out and see if it works.
Unfortunately, it did not fix my problem.

Nevermind, I found a fix! I just messed around with the RGB values with Duna and scatterer and found a way to visibly remove the Mie! The values (for rayleigh scattering) are R:00.028500  G:00.012500  B:00.007800
